Arm II : Patients receive high-dose CCI-779 IV 30 minute weekly . Arm III : Patients receive low-dose placebo IV 30 minute weekly . Arm IV : Patients receive high-dose placebo IV 30 minute weekly . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients develop progressive disease receive placebo may cross equivalent dose CCI-779 .
